EmailTemplate.name: 07-20-22 BNK ATMaaS Email 5.Email 5 Flipbook
EmailTemplate.subject: The FI’s journey– the road to as a service
EmailTemplate.textOnly: At NCR we make it simple to shift your ATM network to an as a Service model. Download our flipbook to see examples of how financial institutions can improve their customer experience and drive efficiencies. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
